Section.name: S_2263
Section.title: PATHOLOGIC STAGE CLASSIFICATION (pTNM, AJCC 8th Edition) (Note F)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_51559
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_51559_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

ListItem.name: LI_327642
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_2266
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

DisplayedItem.name: DI_43482
DisplayedItem.title: pT1: Tumor limited to ampulla of Vater or sphincter of Oddi or tumor invades beyond the sphincter of Oddi (perisphincteric invasion) and / or into the duodenal submucosa

ListItem.name: LI_37672
ListItem.title: pT1a: Tumor limited to ampulla of Vater or sphincter of Oddi

ListItem.name: LI_37673
ListItem.title: pT1b: Tumor invades beyond the sphincter of Oddi (perisphincteric invasion) and / or into the duodenal submucosa

ListItem.name: LI_37674
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor invades into the muscularis propria of the duodenum

DisplayedItem.name: DI_40639
DisplayedItem.title: pT3: Tumor directly invades the pancreas (up to 0.5 cm) or tumor extends more than 0.5 cm into the pancreas, or extends into peripancreatic or periduodenal tissue or duodenal serosa without involvement of the celiac axis or superior mesenteric artery

ListItem.name: LI_37676
ListItem.title: pT3a: Tumor directly invades pancreas (up to 0.5 cm)

ListItem.name: LI_37677
ListItem.title: pT3b: Tumor extends more than 0.5 cm into the pancreas, or extends into peripancreatic tissue or periduodenal tissue or duodenal serosa without involvement of the celiac axis or superior mesenteric artery

ListItem.name: LI_37678
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor involves the celiac axis, superior mesenteric artery, and / or common hepatic artery, irrespective of size

ListItem.name: LI_327644
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327645
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_2274
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_37687
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis to one to three regional lymph nodes

ListItem.name: LI_37688
ListItem.title: pN2: Metastasis to four or more regional lymph nodes

ListItem.name: LI_18293
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)
